ygData.subject: RE: [Digest Number 83]
ygData.msgSnippet: For me at level 20 - Shaman with speed buffs and light healing Enchanter as crowd control (Speeding me up, slowing them down) And a GOOD cleric. Not that you
ygData.messageBody:
For me at level 20 -

Shaman with speed buffs and light healing
Enchanter as crowd control (Speeding me up, slowing them down)

And a GOOD cleric.

Not that you asked, but if I were asked to choose a party of 6:

1 - Monk
2 - Monk / Ranger / Paladin
3 - Enchanter
4 - Druid / Shaman
5 - Cleric
6 - Wizard / Magician

I've been in MystMoore with a group at that configuration for about a week.
We have almost 0 down time and only lost a member once (Due to the *nasty*
trains).

Any suggestions on that? I've heard the bard arguement but I just can't see
giving up a slot that could be better used to a bard. Maybe I've just been
with bad bards.

-----Original Message-----
From: Andrew Grant [mailto:thedonkey@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 06, 1999 2:54 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [[EQ-Monks] Digest Number 83]


From: Andrew Grant <thedonkey@...>

waht classes work well with the monk or
What classes make he monk more powerful

andrew
